alert.note: Alert for Cumberland (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 7:58PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Cumberland County through 830 PM EDT... At 758 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laurel Lake, or near Millville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vineland, Millville, Cumberland, Laurel Lake, Mauricetown, Bricksboro, Port Elizabeth, Dividing Creek and Port Norris. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
